translation.en: You're the new girl, right? Emily?
-It's Elodie. -Rachelle. Our dads work together.
translation.fr:
- Elodie.
- Rachelle. Nos pères bossent ensemble.

translation.en: I heard about your mom. That is so tragic.
translation.fr: J'ai appris pour ta mère. Tragique.

translation.en: Are you okay? Wait. Is that a weird question to ask?
translation.fr: Ça va ? C'est bizarre de demander ça ?

translation.en: Of course you're not okay.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que ça va pas.

translation.en: It's fine. I'm... fine.
You probably haven't heard, but there's this back-to-school blowout tonight.
translation.fr:
Tu l'ignores sûrement,
il y a une fête pour la rentrée ce soir.

translation.en: Want to come?
I'm not really into the whole party thing.
And how's that working for you?
-Are we even invited? -It's a house party.
translation.fr:
- On est invitées ?
- C'est une soirée.

translation.en: You don't get invited. You either go or don't go.
translation.fr: Y a pas d'invitation. On y va ou pas.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure.
I'll pick you up at eight. And maybe go with the less grandfatherly vibe.
translation.fr:
Je passe te prendre à 20 h.
Et choisis un style un peu moins papi.

translation.en: -[girl 1 scoffs] You're ridiculous. -[girl 2] What?
-I never get a good picture of my ass. -Oh, my heart breaks. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
- J'ai pas de bonne photo de mon cul.
- J'ai le cœur brisé.

translation.en: So, what's our timing for Ravi's tonight?
translation.fr: À quelle heure on va chez Ravi ce soir ?

translation.en: [girl 2] Ah, you tell me.
I heard he's bringing back the ice luge.
translation.fr: Il va refaire la luge à alcool.

translation.en: Oh, please, do not throw up again.
Can I help you?
Oh. Sorry, I was just...
Oh, my God, it's Kendall and Kylie.
Not the friendliest, are they?
[chanting] Drink, drink, drink! Drink, drink, drink, drink!
Way better than Albuquerque, am I right?
What's their deal?
[Rachelle] Who? Tabitha and Brady?
He's a senior and she's so pretty she's basically an avatar.
translation.fr:
Il est en terminale et elle est belle,
on dirait un avatar.

translation.en: It's like they knew they were the two hottest people in school and decided,
translation.fr:
Ils savaient qu'ils étaient
les plus beaux du lycée et ont décidé

translation.en: "Why not be cliché?"
[man] Noah, you're doing it all wrong. It's all in the flick of the wrist.
translation.fr: Noah, tu sais pas faire. Tout est dans le poignet.

translation.en: That's so myth. It's actually all in the tip...
translation.fr:
C'est un mythe.
En fait, c'est dans le bout...

translation.en: ...of your finger.
Speaking of the genetically blessed, it is not right how hot Noah Simos is.
translation.fr:
En parlant de bons gènes,
Noah Simos est trop canon.

translation.en: Totally.
Alas, my odds are better with Brian from Honors Chem.
translation.fr:
Hélas, j'ai plus de chances avec Brian
du cours de chimie.

translation.en: I'm gonna go dazzle him with my wit.
translation.fr: Je vais aller l'éblouir avec mon esprit.

translation.en: Try not to stand around looking all... murdery.
translation.fr:
Essaye de pas avoir l'air...
d'une meurtrière.

translation.en: [Brady] Look, why'd you even bother coming if you're gonna be such a bitch?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu es venue
si c'est pour être aussi conne ?

translation.en: [Tabitha] You're offensive.
-What? Come on. Let's go back inside. -Brady, I want to go.
translation.fr:
- Retournons à l'intérieur.
- Brady, je veux partir.

translation.en: You need to lighten up. All right? You used to be more fun.
translation.fr:
Détends-toi un peu.
Tu étais plus marrante, avant.

translation.en: -You used to be less of a dick. -Hey.
Can you stop, Brady? You're hurting me.
translation.fr: Arrête, Brady. Tu me fais mal.

translation.en: -Brady, let go! -[Brady scoffs]
Fine. Be that way.
[Tabitha gasps] Shit!
Perfect.
Bro. We were down by so much in the half, and then you came back and you crushed it.
translation.fr: Le score était bas à la mi-temps, mais après, vous les avez écrasés.

translation.en: Bro, it was like David and Goliath.
-That goalie was a beast. A literal beast. -Right?
translation.fr:
- Le goal est une bête.
- Oui. Une vraie bête.

translation.en: -How you doing? -Hi.
So... you got a little something right there.
translation.fr: Dis donc..  tu as un truc, là.

translation.en: -Oh. -Hold on, let me get it. Hold on.
I won't tell anybody if you don't. All right?
Thanks.
All right. I'm gonna catch you around. Peace.
translation.fr: Je te vois plus tard. Peace.

translation.en: -[Rachelle] Wanna get out of here? -[Brian] What about your friend?
translation.fr:
- On se tire ?
- Et ton amie ?

translation.en: New girl? Honestly, I just brought her 'cause my dad asked me to be nice to her.
translation.fr:
La nouvelle ? Mon père m'a demandé
d'être sympa avec elle.

translation.en: Let's go.
[man] Gonna need you to put that down.
Come with me.
You fucking kidding me?
[man] We're here. Hey.
We're here.
Do I seriously have to do this?
I told you, it was just a misunderstanding.
Come on, El. The security guard caught you red-handed.
translation.fr:
Allez, El.
Le vigile t'a prise en flagrant délit.

translation.en: You're lucky they didn't press charges.
translation.fr:
Tu as de la veine
qu'ils n'aient pas porté plainte.

translation.en: That's me, super lucky.
Well, I thought what happened back in Albuquerque was a one-time thing.
translation.fr:
Je croyais qu'à Albuquerque,
c'était un incident isolé.

translation.en: My friend Suzanne says these kind of things have helped some of her patients.
translation.fr:
Mon amie Suzanne dit
que ces réunions aident certains de ses patients.

translation.en: [man] Jenna is right. You never know, it could be good for you.
translation.fr: Jenna a raison. Ça pourrait te faire du bien.

translation.en: Whatever.
You're gonna miss my science fair.
translation.fr: Tu vas rater mon concours de science.

translation.en: Seems like your parents have other plans for me.
translation.fr: Tes parents ont d'autres projets pour moi.

translation.en: Look, if you want, I-- I could come back and leave early, pick you up.
translation.fr: Écoute... si tu veux, je peux revenir te chercher.

translation.en: It's fine. I'll take the MAX.
translation.fr: C'est bon. Je prendrai le métro.

translation.en: [Jenna] We'll see you back home.
translation.fr: On se voit à la maison.

translation.en: [woman] "God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change,
translation.fr:
"Dieu, accorde-moi la sérénité d'accepter
ce que je ne peux changer,

translation.en: courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference."
translation.fr:
le courage de changer ce qui est possible,
et la sagesse de voir la différence."

translation.en: Good afternoon, everyone.
I'm Shawn...
Hi, Shawn.
...and I'm a kleptomaniac.
I'm four years shoplifting-free.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas volé depuis quatre ans.

translation.en: I'm also a codependent and the child of an alcoholic.
translation.fr:
Je suis aussi codépendante
et l'enfant d'un alcoolique.

translation.en: [chuckles] And I've learned not to be defined by labels.
translation.fr: Mais les étiquettes ne me définissent pas.

translation.en: So, who would like to share today?
[Shawn] Great.
[Stella] Hi, I'm Stella.
[all] Hi, Stella.
It's been six months since I've lifted anything...
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien volé depuis six mois...

translation.en: and it's not like I haven't been tempted.
I mean, there's a Petco on my corner.
translation.fr: Il y a une animalerie près de chez moi.

translation.en: [Stella] I just keep telling myself, if I stick with the program,
translation.fr:
Je me dis
que si je suis le programme,

translation.en: I'll stay clean.
Hi, I'm Claire.
[all] Hi, Claire.
[Claire] Since that incident at work, I've... started taking stuff from the office.
translation.fr:
Depuis l'incident au boulot,
je vole des trucs au bureau.

translation.en: Uh, staplers, pens.
I know I need to stop.
But... it's like there's this hole that I keep trying to fill
translation.fr:
Mais... c'est comme un trou
que je dois remplir,

translation.en: with all of these office supplies...
-and it's, like, never enough, you know? -[door closes]
[Shawn] Thank you.
[Shawn] Hello there.
We've got a lot of new faces today.
Please... feel welcome to share if you're so inspired.
translation.fr: Je vous en prie. Partagez si vous en avez envie.

translation.en: Any of the other newcomers?
What about you in the back?
Me?
I... don't really feel like sharing, if that's okay.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas très envie de partager.

translation.en: Of course.
But your shares are a valuable part of our collective journey.
translation.fr:
Le partage est une partie-clé
de notre parcours collectif.

translation.en: I promise you, this is an incredibly safe space.
I don't really know what to say.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas quoi dire.

translation.en: Why don't you tell us your name?
Hi, I'm Elodie.
[all] Hi, Elodie.
[Shawn] Do you want to tell us about the first time you stole?
translation.fr:
Parle-nous de la première fois
où tu as volé.

translation.en: it was a couple months ago.
translation.fr: C'était il y a quelques mois.

translation.en: It was kind of an accident. I...
walked out of a hospital cafeteria with a pack of Starbursts I forgot to pay for.
translation.fr:
Je suis sortie d'une cafétéria d'hôpital
avec un paquet de bonbons.

translation.en: Once I realized, I knew I should have gone back, but...
translation.fr:
Je m'en suis rendue compte,
et j'aurais dû y retourner, mais...

translation.en: I kind of felt like I deserved it.
translation.fr: je me suis dit que je le méritais.

translation.en: there are forces that can randomly take people away.
translation.fr:
Il y a des forces qui peuvent
nous prendre des gens.

translation.en: There should be...
forces that randomly give you things for free.
translation.fr:
des forces
qui nous donnent des trucs gratuits.

translation.en: [Shawn] We are incredibly grateful for that share.
translation.fr: On te remercie de t'être exprimée.

translation.en: Is that a Courtney Barnett pin? -I love her music. -Yeah.
translation.fr:
C'est un pin's de Courtney Barnett ?
J'adore sa musique.

translation.en: She did an after-party at this club where I work.
translation.fr:
Elle a fait une after
à la boîte où je travaille.

translation.en: She was chill.
Did she play "Avant Gardener"? Yeah, people went nuts.
translation.fr:
- Elle a joué "Avant Gardener" ?
- Oui, la foule était en délire.

translation.en: You like long walks on the beach? I like long walks on the beach.
translation.fr:
Tu aimes marcher sur la plage ?
J'adore marcher sur la plage.

translation.en: -Moe, why are you always giving me shit? -With a face like that? Someone's got to.
translation.fr:
- Moe, pourquoi tu m'emmerdes ?
- Avec ta gueule, il faut bien.

translation.en: She can't help herself.
You guys know each other?
-[Moe and Tabitha] No. -We go to the same school.
translation.fr:
- Non.
- On va au même lycée.

translation.en: Right on. Luca.
Elodie.
And you are?
Tabitha.
Tabitha.
I know your type.
Is that so?
Let me guess. Some judge cut you a sweet deal.
translation.fr: Laisse-moi deviner. Un juge a été indulgent avec toi.

translation.en: [Shawn] Shall we reconvene?
Drool much?
Just so we're clear, this never happened.
translation.fr:
Que ce soit clair.
Tout ça n'est jamais arrivé.

translation.en: Shocker.
-Oh, hey. I was just-- -Sure.
-So, where are you from? -New Mexico.
Ah. The land of meth heads and UFOs.
translation.fr: Le pays de la meth et des ovnis.

translation.en: I hope you said goodbye to the sun. Forever.
translation.fr: Tu as dit adieu au soleil, j'espère ?

translation.en: -That bad? -Yeah. And the people here suck, too.
translation.fr:
- À ce point ?
- Oui, et les gens sont nuls ici.

translation.en: Everyone's obsessed with keeping Portland weird.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde tient
au mode de vie de Portland.

translation.en: It's oppressive.
-Life is oppressive. -That why you steal?
translation.fr: La vie est oppressante. C'est pour ça que tu voles ?

translation.en: I just... need some concealer.
[Moe scoffs] Oh, hey. You better keep an eye on that one.
Guess old habits die hard.
Look, I only showed up today
because my dad's lawyer convinced some judge
translation.fr:
car l'avocat de mon père
a convaincu un juge

translation.en: that going there once a week would be my salvation.
translation.fr:
qu'y aller une fois par semaine
va me sauver.

translation.en: From what? Your unlimited allowance?
translation.fr: De quoi ? Ton argent de poche illimité ?

translation.en: Mommy's Pinterest palace? The holistic family chef?
translation.fr:
Du palais Pinterest de maman ?
De votre cuistot privé holistique ?

translation.en: -[whispers] Is he mean to you? -I'm not doing this with you.
translation.fr:
- Il est méchant ?
- Je rentrerai pas dans ton jeu.

translation.en: Fine. Just tell me what they got you for.
translation.fr: Bon. Ils t'ont eue pour quoi ?

translation.en: Bracelet. Got a little cocky. A hidden camera.
translation.fr: Un bracelet. Trop sûre de moi. Caméra cachée.

translation.en: So what's your deal?
I... don't really feel comfortable talking about this here.
translation.fr: J'ai pas envie de parler de ça ici.

translation.en: Fuck talking.
Let's see who can get the best shit in the shortest amount of time.
translation.fr:
Voyons qui peut voler le meilleur truc
en le moins de temps.

translation.en: Winner takes all.
And how do we account for taste?
translation.fr: Et le bon goût dans tout ça ?

translation.en: Highest price tag wins.
translation.fr: Le prix le plus cher l'emporte.

translation.en: Fine.
Cool.
Meet in the park across the street in 30.
translation.fr:
On se retrouve au parc d'en face
dans 30 mn.

translation.en: Looks like what's-her-name's a no-show.
translation.fr: L'autre nous a plantées, on dirait.

translation.en: Probably got nabbed. When will they ever learn?
translation.fr: Elle a dû se faire prendre. Ça lui apprendra.

translation.en: Whatever. Let's get this over with.
After you, Tabby.
-Don't call me that. -Right.
translation.fr:
- M'appelle pas comme ça.
- C'est vrai.

translation.en: You like to pretend we didn't co-parent a Polly Pocket.
translation.fr:
Tu veux oublier qu'on a joué
à la poupée ensemble.

translation.en: Look, I get that those may have been your glory days,
translation.fr: Je sais que c'était ton époque de gloire,

translation.en: but you can spare me the trip down memory lane.
Whatever you say, Tabby.
Not bad.
Your turn.
-What the hell is this? -Spanx.
[chuckles] Were you even trying?
Yo, you're late and empty-handed.
translation.fr:
Tu es en retard
et tu arrives les mains vides.

translation.en: Holy shit.
Yeah, right. Those are not real.
No, but they were $400.
And the winner is...
Well, I really don't think it's your style.
Don't be a garbage human. We made a deal.
translation.fr: Sois pas une ordure humaine. On avait un accord.

translation.en: Give her the jacket.
No, she's right.
It's not really me.
Moe, have you been kidnapped?
Yes. Send for help!
They're such losers.
Hey, Brady.
Look, I'm stranded. Can you come and pick me up?
translation.fr:
Je suis coincée.
Tu peux passer me chercher ?

translation.en: Thanks. I'm dropping a pin.
translation.fr: Merci, je t'envoie où je suis.

translation.en: Can you quit stalking me?
Sorry. It's just...
what happened with you and Brady at the party...
translation.fr: Ce qui vous est arrivé à la soirée...

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about.
translation.fr: Tu ne sais pas de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: I just mean if you...
ever need someone to talk to...
Unlike you,
I have friends, so I'm good.
Hey, babe.
You look nice.
I got your favorite. Extra foam.
translation.fr: Ton préféré. Avec mousse en plus.

translation.en: Thanks.
[Doug] I know you said you weren't hungry.
-Ever hear of knocking? -Oh, sorry. I just brought you a sprout bowl.
translation.fr:
- Tu peux frapper ?
- Désolé. Je t'apporte un bol.

translation.en: Thanks.
Uh, look. I hope I wasn't too hard on you about this whole shoplifting thing.
translation.fr:
Je voulais pas être trop dur avec toi
pour cette histoire de vol.

translation.en: I mean, God knows, I pulled some stupid stunts at your age
translation.fr: J'ai fait bien des conneries à ton âge,

translation.en: and I hadn't gone through anything close to what you have.
translation.fr: et je n'avais pas vécu ce que tu as vécu.

translation.en: It's okay, Dad. We don't have to talk about it.
translation.fr: C'est rien, papa. On n'est pas obligés d'en parler.

translation.en: Don't worry, I will get this elliptical out of here.
translation.fr: T'inquiète pas, je vais retirer ça d'ici.

translation.en: I'm thinking of turning the garage into a home gym.
translation.fr:
Je vais faire une salle de gym
dans le garage.

translation.en: Since when are you into exercise?
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu fais du sport ?

translation.en: Jenna got me into it. Feel like a new man.
translation.fr:
Jenna m'inspire.
Je suis un nouvel homme.

translation.en: You know...
I'm really glad you're here.
translation.fr: c'est bien que tu sois là.

translation.en: You can finally get to know Jenna and Spencer better.
translation.fr:
Tu vas pouvoir apprendre à connaître
Jenna et Spencer.

translation.en: I don't not know them.
translation.fr: Je les connais déjà un peu.

translation.en: Oh, I mean, more than Christmas every other year.
translation.fr: Plus qu'en les voyant un Noël sur deux.

translation.en: Obviously, I wish it were...
under different circumstances-- I've got homework.
So...
Okay, kiddo.
Good night.
You said you'd never be back.
translation.fr: Tu as dit que tu reviendrais jamais.

translation.en: What up, Paula?
You know, same ol'.
-Usual? -Best blueberry pie in town.
translation.fr: Comme d'hab ? La meilleure tarte aux myrtilles du coin.

translation.en: Employee discount still apply?
translation.fr: Tu me fais la remise des employés ?

translation.en: Real reunion in here tonight.
translation.fr: Y a des retrouvailles, ce soir.

translation.en: Hey, yo, Paula, I'll be right back.
-Yes, yes! -There's no way!
You sure about this? The boys are right outside.
translation.fr: Tu es sûre ? Les garçons sont juste là.

translation.en: How long before they miss you?
I don't know. Two, three minutes.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Deux ou trois minutes.

translation.en: Works for me.
♪ So you want to know the distance ♪
Let's go, slore.
[Elodie] The first rule of shoplifting is to be invisible in plain sight.
translation.fr:
La première règle du voleur à l'étalage, c'est de se rendre invisible
à la vue de tous.

translation.en: But... aren't we kind of doing that all the time?
translation.fr: Mais... on fait tous ça sans arrêt, non ?

translation.en: It's like we filter our lives to fit into other people's ideas
translation.fr:
On filtre nos vies pour qu'elles
correspondent aux attentes des autres,

translation.en: of who we're supposed to be.
translation.fr: sur qui on est censé être,

translation.en: Who we're supposed to date.
Or how we're supposed to deal with heartbreak.
translation.fr: ou comment on est censé gérer le chagrin.

translation.en: [Elodie] But... what if you meet people who...
translation.fr:
Mais que se passe-t-il
quand on rencontre des gens qui...

translation.en: without even trying, just...
see you?
What if the people you least expect could turn out to be... your people...
translation.fr:
Parfois, les gens les plus improbables
peuvent se révéler être nos semblables.

translation.en: if you let them?
translation.fr: Il suffit de s'ouvrir à eux.
